description:
Denzel (デンゼル, Denzeru) is a recurring character in the Compilation of Final Fantasy VII. A young child, Denzel`s life is one of many misfortunes, but later ends up becoming Cloud Strife`s adopted son. He fights with a metal rod, similar to the weapons used by Aerith Gainsborough during Final Fantasy VII.
According to the novella, On the Way to a Smile: The Case of Denzel, Denzel grew up in a well-to-do family in Midgar`s Sector 7. His father, Abel, worked for Shinra, while his mother, Chloe, worked around the house.
Source: http://finalfantasy.wikia.com/wiki/Denzel
name: Denzel
